title: The Fall of Ossard
description: Juvela is Different. Coming of age in a city of merchant princes, Juvela discovers she can see what others canâ€™t; the very currents of the celestial are open to her, and that includes the truths they hide. In a city plagued by a string of child thefts, as dark factions rise up to grab power, few are prepared to take a stand as the city falls into chaos amidst flames, doom and ritual slaughter. Yet, through Juvela, hope persists.
author: Colin Taber
